Hi,

For those with seeking Pb, you can remux the file to mkv :
- Demux Video & Audio with YAMB
- Remux with mkvmerge (mmg.exe in the mkvtoolnix), Video Property (AR 2.40 , FPS 24000/1001p), for the Audio property you have to check the "AAC is SBR/HE-AAC/AAC+" case before remuxing.

How to fix the seeking problem:

1. demux file into single tracks (video + audio)
2. mux together again 

Software: MP4Box, mkvmerge

example:
step 1.: commandlines 
MP4Box -raw 1 inputfile.mp4
MP4Box -raw 2 inputfile.mp4

step 2.: start mmg, add both tracks, mux

Done.
